name: hackswift2024
description: Welcome to SmartPantry! It's a revolutionary meal planning application designed to transform your meal planning experience. SmartPantry is  a comprehensive tool aimed at reducing food waste, teaching the correct methods of food storage, and inspiring users to create delicious meals tailored to their tastes and preferences. SmartPantry is a great assist for go-to for meal planning, recipe creation, and food storage tips.
author: Adiba AKter
